analysis.name: analyze
analysis.description: Read-only codebase analysis using Gemini (default), Qwen, or Codex with auto-pattern detection and template selection

analysis.name: bug-diagnosis
analysis.description: Read-only bug root cause analysis using Gemini/Qwen/Codex with systematic diagnosis template for fix suggestions

analysis.name: review
analysis.description: Post-implementation review with specialized types (security/architecture/action-items/quality) using analysis agents and Gemini

general.name: chat
general.description: Read-only Q&A interaction with Gemini/Qwen/Codex for codebase questions with automatic context inference

general.name: cli-init
general.description: Generate .gemini/ and .qwen/ config directories with settings.json and ignore files based on workspace technology detection

general.name: code-analysis
general.description: Read-only execution path tracing using Gemini/Qwen/Codex with specialized analysis template for call flow and optimization

general.name: enhance-prompt
general.description: Enhanced prompt transformation using session memory and codebase analysis with --enhance flag detection

general.name: load
general.description: Delegate to universal-executor agent to analyze project via Gemini/Qwen CLI and return JSON core content package for task context

general.name: tech-research
general.description: 3-phase orchestrator: extract tech stack from session/name → delegate to agent for Exa research and module generation → generate SKILL.md index (skips phase 2 if exists)

general.name: update-full
general.description: Update all CLAUDE.md files using layer-based execution (Layer 3→1) with batched agents (4 modules/agent) and gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <20 modules uses direct parallel

general.name: update-related
general.description: Update CLAUDE.md for git-changed modules using batched agent execution (4 modules/agent) with gemini→qwen→codex fallback, <15 modules uses direct execution

general.name: version
general.description: Display Claude Code version information and check for updates

general.name: artifacts
general.description: Interactive clarification generating confirmed guidance specification through role-based analysis and synthesis

general.name: auto-parallel
general.description: Parallel brainstorming automation with dynamic role selection and concurrent execution across multiple perspectives

general.name: data-architect
general.description: Generate or update data-architect/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for data architecture perspective
general.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

general.name: product-manager
general.description: Generate or update product-manager/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for product management perspective
general.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

general.name: product-owner
general.description: Generate or update product-owner/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for product ownership perspective
general.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

general.name: scrum-master
general.description: Generate or update scrum-master/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for Agile process perspective
general.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

general.name: subject-matter-expert
general.description: Generate or update subject-matter-expert/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for domain expertise perspective
general.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

general.name: synthesis
general.description: Clarify and refine role analyses through intelligent Q&A and targeted updates with synthesis agent

general.name: system-architect
general.description: Generate or update system-architect/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for system architecture perspective
general.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

general.name: ux-expert
general.description: Generate or update ux-expert/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for UX perspective
general.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

general.name: list
general.description: List all workflow sessions with status filtering, shows session metadata and progress information

general.name: start
general.description: Discover existing sessions or start new workflow session with intelligent session management and conflict detection

general.name: conflict-resolution
general.description: Detect and resolve conflicts between plan and existing codebase using CLI-powered analysis with Gemini/Qwen

general.name: gather
general.description: Intelligently collect project context using context-search-agent based on task description, packages into standardized JSON

general.name: animation-extract
general.description: Extract animation and transition patterns from prompt inference and image references for design system documentation

general.name: capture
general.description: Batch screenshot capture for UI design workflows using MCP puppeteer or local fallback with URL mapping

general.name: explore-auto
general.description: Interactive exploratory UI design workflow with style-centric batch generation, creates design variants from prompts/images with parallel execution and user selection

general.name: explore-layers
general.description: Interactive deep UI capture with depth-controlled layer exploration using MCP puppeteer

general.name: imitate-auto
general.description: UI design workflow with direct code/image input for design token extraction and prototype generation

general.name: layout-extract
general.description: Extract structural layout information from reference images, URLs, or text prompts using Claude analysis with variant generation or refinement mode

general.name: list
general.description: List all available design runs with metadata (session, created time, prototype count)

general.name: style-extract
general.description: Extract design style from reference images or text prompts using Claude analysis with variant generation or refinement mode

general.name: update
general.description: Update brainstorming artifacts with finalized design system references from selected prototypes

implementation.name: codex-execute
implementation.description: Multi-stage Codex execution with automatic task decomposition into grouped subtasks using resume mechanism for context continuity

implementation.name: execute
implementation.description: Autonomous code implementation with YOLO auto-approval using Gemini/Qwen/Codex, supports task ID or description input with automatic file pattern detection

implementation.name: create
implementation.description: Generate task JSON from natural language description with automatic file pattern detection, scope inference, and dependency analysis

implementation.name: execute
implementation.description: Execute task JSON using appropriate agent (@doc-generator/@implementation-agent/@test-agent) with pre-analysis context loading and status tracking

implementation.name: execute
implementation.description: Coordinate agent execution for workflow tasks with automatic session discovery, parallel task processing, and status tracking

implementation.name: test-cycle-execute
implementation.description: Execute test-fix workflow with dynamic task generation and iterative fix cycles until test pass rate >= 95% or max iterations reached. Uses @cli-planning-agent for failure analysis and task generation.

implementation.name: task-generate-agent
implementation.description: Autonomous task generation using action-planning-agent with discovery and output phases for workflow planning

implementation.name: task-generate-tdd
implementation.description: Autonomous TDD task generation using action-planning-agent with Red-Green-Refactor cycles, test-first structure, and cycle validation

implementation.name: task-generate
implementation.description: Generate task JSON files and IMPL_PLAN.md from analysis results using action-planning-agent with artifact integration

implementation.name: test-task-generate
implementation.description: Autonomous test-fix task generation using action-planning-agent with test-fix-retest cycle specification and discovery phase

implementation.name: generate
implementation.description: Assemble UI prototypes by combining layout templates with design tokens (default animation support), pure assembler without new content generation

planning.name: discuss-plan
planning.description: Multi-round collaborative planning using Gemini, Codex, and Claude synthesis with iterative discussion cycles (read-only, no code changes)

planning.name: plan
planning.description: Read-only architecture planning using Gemini/Qwen/Codex with strategic planning template for modification plans and impact analysis

planning.name: breakdown
planning.description: Decompose complex task into subtasks with dependency mapping, creates child task JSONs with parent references and execution order

planning.name: replan
planning.description: Update task JSON with new requirements or batch-update multiple tasks from verification report, tracks changes in task-changes.json

planning.name: action-plan-verify
planning.description: Perform non-destructive cross-artifact consistency analysis between IMPL_PLAN.md and task JSONs with quality gate validation

planning.name: api-designer
planning.description: Generate or update api-designer/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for API design perspective
planning.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

planning.name: ui-designer
planning.description: Generate or update ui-designer/analysis.md addressing guidance-specification discussion points for UI design perspective
planning.arguments: optional topic - uses existing framework if available

planning.name: lite-plan
planning.description: Lightweight interactive planning and execution workflow with in-memory planning, code exploration, and immediate execution after user confirmation

planning.name: plan
planning.description: 5-phase planning workflow with action-planning-agent task generation, outputs IMPL_PLAN.md and task JSONs with optional CLI auto-execution

planning.name: tdd-plan
planning.description: TDD workflow planning with Red-Green-Refactor task chain generation, test-first development structure, and cycle tracking

planning.name: workflow:ui-design:codify-style
planning.description: Orchestrator to extract styles from code and generate shareable reference package with preview (automatic file discovery)

planning.name: workflow:ui-design:import-from-code
planning.description: Import design system from code files (CSS/JS/HTML/SCSS) with automatic file discovery and parallel agent analysis

planning.name: workflow:ui-design:reference-page-generator
planning.description: Generate multi-component reference pages and documentation from design run extraction

documentation.name: code-map-memory
documentation.description: 3-phase orchestrator: parse feature keyword → cli-explore-agent analyzes (Deep Scan dual-source) → orchestrator generates Mermaid docs + SKILL package (skips phase 2 if exists)

documentation.name: docs
documentation.description: Plan documentation workflow with dynamic grouping (≤10 docs/task), generates IMPL tasks for parallel module trees, README, ARCHITECTURE, and HTTP API docs

documentation.name: load-skill-memory
documentation.description: Activate SKILL package (auto-detect from paths/keywords or manual) and intelligently load documentation based on task intent keywords

documentation.name: skill-memory
documentation.description: 4-phase autonomous orchestrator: check docs → /memory:docs planning → /workflow:execute → generate SKILL.md with progressive loading index (skips phases 2-3 if docs exist)

documentation.name: style-skill-memory
documentation.description: Generate SKILL memory package from style reference for easy loading and consistent design system usage

documentation.name: workflow-skill-memory
documentation.description: Process WFS-* archived sessions using universal-executor agents with Gemini analysis to generate workflow-progress SKILL package (sessions-timeline, lessons, conflicts)

session-management.name: resume
session-management.description: Resume paused workflow session with automatic progress analysis, pending task identification, and conflict detection
session-management.arguments: session-id for workflow session to resume

session-management.name: complete
session-management.description: Mark active workflow session as complete, archive with lessons learned, update manifest, remove active flag

session-management.name: resume
session-management.description: Resume the most recently paused workflow session with automatic session discovery and status update

session-management.name: workflow:status
session-management.description: Generate on-demand task status views from JSON task data with optional task-id filtering for detailed view

testing.name: tdd-verify
testing.description: Verify TDD workflow compliance against Red-Green-Refactor cycles, generate quality report with coverage analysis

testing.name: test-fix-gen
testing.description: Create test-fix workflow session from session ID, description, or file path with test strategy generation and task planning

testing.name: test-gen
testing.description: Create independent test-fix workflow session from completed implementation session, analyzes code to generate test tasks

testing.name: tdd-coverage-analysis
testing.description: Analyze test coverage and TDD cycle execution with Red-Green-Refactor compliance verification

testing.name: test-concept-enhanced
testing.description: Analyze test requirements and generate test generation strategy using Gemini with test-context package

testing.name: test-context-gather
testing.description: Collect test coverage context using test-context-search-agent and package into standardized test-context JSON
